name: AICPA ASSOCIATION OF INTERNATIONAL CERTIFIED PROFESSIONAL ACCOUNTANTS
description: member association representing the accounting profession
firms: VENTURE GOVERNMENT STRATEGIES, LLC (FKA HOBART HALLAWAY & QUAYLE VENTURES, LLC)
sampleDescriptions: Issues impacting multiple areas of the tax law and code, including tax extenders; implementation of H.R.1, Tax Cuts and Jobs Act (P.L.115-97); IRS regulation of tax practitioners; HR 1393/S.540, Mobile Workforce State Income Tax Simplification Act of 2017.
Issues related to accounting and auditing professionals.

Issues related to accounting and auditing professionals, including;
Occupational licensing reform.

H.R.5515/S.2987, National Defense Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2019 (P.L.115-232).

Antitrust liability;
Apprenticeship programs.
Issues related to apprenticeship programs.

COVID-19 relief to individuals, businesses, and other organizations, including implementation of CARES Act, Pub. L. 116-136, specifically Paycheck Protection Program SBA 7(a) loans and Economic Injury Disaster Loans.

Issues impacting the accounting and auditing profession.
Authorization to provide funding to IFRS Foundation-FY 2021 Financial Services and General Government Appropriations.
Accounting treatment of troubled-debt restructurings.
Issues related to adding accounting to STEM definition.
Issues related to antitrust liability.

COVID-19 relief to individuals, businesses, and other organizations, including implementation of CARES Act, Pub. L. 116-136, specifically Paycheck Protection Program SBA 7(a) loans and Economic Injury Disaster Loans; Consolidated Appropriations Act, 2021 (P.L. 116-260).
Antitrust liability, Occupational Licensing Board Antitrust Damages Act of 2020, H.R. 6880.

COVID-19 relief to individuals, businesses, and other organizations, including: implementation of CARES Act, P.L. 116-136, specifically Paycheck Protection Program (PPP) SBA 7(a) loans; legislative changes to PPP, including extending the program application deadline (H.R. 1799, the PPP Extension Act of 2021); the American Rescue Plan Act of 2021, P.L. 117-2; Consolidated Appropriations Act, 2021, P.L. 116- 260.
